input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SECO STAATSSEKRETARIAT FÜR WIRTSCHAFT - INTERNATIONALE ARBEITSFRAGEN DAIN. Summary: National Action Plan on Business and Human Rights 2024-2027. Description: Objective: To promote dialogue between stakeholders in order to strengthen the implementation of human rights in the practices of Swiss companies. Activities: · (Measure 3) Organise the third national forum on business and human rights in 2026 and roundtable discussions involving companies, academia, non-governmental organisations, the public sector and international organisations. · (Measure 5 reinforced) Ensuring the transfer of knowledge and best practices between the various actors. In doing so: o Promote dialogue between stakeholders, including business associations and civil society, by supporting roundtable discussions and discussion platforms. The aim is to promote constructive cooperation by developing practical solutions for better respect for human rights in business activities. The focus here is primarily on multi-stakeholder initiatives in the cocoa, gold, sustainable textiles and coffee sectors, as well as on the implementation of the Voluntary Principles on Security and Human Rights and the International Code of Conduct for Private Security Service Providers, in which Switzerland already plays an active role. <br> Doc Title: National Action Plan on Business and Human Rights 2024-2027 <br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-07-28. Closing Date: 2025-09-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: On the occasion of the development of the electricity supply law (StromVG) or the revision of the energy law (Eng) in 2007, the parliament decided "competitive tenders for efficiency measures", in particular to reduce electricity consumption. The corresponding fundingFor the competitive tenders, a fund comes from a fund that is bought to the power grid via a surcharge. With the revision of the Energy Ordinance of March 8, 2008, the Federal Council commissioned the Federal Office of Energy (BFE) to implement the tenders, in 2010the first "competitive tenders". Since then, "competitive tenders", under the name "Prokilowatt", have been carried out annually.The operational implementation takes place by an external office, with all tasks related to web-based application processing, hosting and maintaining the web input tool, the management of the database, accompanying the project and program implementation as well as the controlling of theimplemented measures are operational activities. Another important task of the external office is also the first point of contact for (potential) applicants, project owners, program carriers and all other actors such as energy consultants andfar.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL DEPARTMENT OF ECONOMIC AFFAIRS, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH EAER. Summary: Project Ur_01132-01 for the Implementation of the ‘Circular Electronics Initiative (Cei)- Programme (Mid-2025 to Mid-2029). Description: The implementing agency is the entity in charge of overall programme management, including operational, administrative and financial management. The overall development objective of the Circular Electronics Initiative is to develop framework conditions that enable the implementation of sustainable re-use and recycling of WEEE (Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment) practices in SECO partner countries. The programme is focusing on four elements: * development of an adequate legislative, policy and institutional framework; * clear normative requirements and verification/enforcement mechanisms ensuring a level playing field; * an appropriate, professionally functioning collection and treatment (including re-use and recycling technology), and * statistics and monitoring. Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) will be the overarching concept guiding work on these elements. <br> Doc Title: Project UR_01132-01 for the implementation of the ‘Circular Electronics initiative (CEI)- Programme (mid-2025 to mid-2029) <br> Contract Type: services. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL DEPARTMENT OF ECONOMIC AFFAIRS, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH EAER, STATE SECRETARIAT FOR ECONOMIC AFFAIRS SECO. Summary: Ur_00748-03 Destination Durable Tunisie. Description: The implementation agency will be responsible for overall management, including operational, administrative, and financial management of the 'Sustainable Destination Tunisia' project. The project's overarching goal is to strengthen sustainable and inclusive tourism in the southeastern destinations of Tunisia to generate income, improve existing jobs, and create new ones for the population. The program enhances the attractiveness of the destinations by supporting local stakeholders (including Destination Management Organizations - DMOs), projects, and initiatives, by strengthening skills in sustainable tourism, and by improving the regulatory framework. The creation of a fund will enable a demand-driven approach to destination development, thereby ensuring the sustainability of interventions. The core mandate covers a period of 4 years (2025-2028) with, subject to SECO-s financial approval, the option for an additional phase of up to equal duration (total projected project duration: 8 years). The budget for the first phase amounts to CHF 4.4 million (including a contribution from Tunisian counterparts estimated at around CHF 400,000), and a potential second phase would amount to a maximum of a similar sum. <br> Doc Title: UR_00748-03 Destination Durable Tunisie <br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2024-08-08. Closing Date: 2024-10-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: FEDERAL DEPARTMENT OF ECONOMIC AFFAIRS, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH EAER, STATE SECRETARIAT FOR ECONOMIC AFFAIRS SECO

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: OFFICE FOR LANDSCAPE AND NATURE KT. ZURICH, NATURE CONSERVATION DEPARTMENT. Summary: Submission Area Support of over -communal Nature Conservation Objects, Gbt No. 4 Rafzerfeld Office for Landscape and Nature Kt. Zurich, Nature Conservation Department. Description: The "Fachstelle Natorschutz (FNS)" is the competent authority in the canton of Zurich for the application of the legislation on the protection of nature for all the objects of protection of the supracommunal nature. He takes care of the conservation of housing and species threatened and protected of supracommunal importance. For this, it is necessary to ensure management in accordance with objectives, guide visitors and take many maintenance measures to preserve the function of vegetation elements, constructions and infrastructure. For these various tasks, the FNS uses external specialists. The purpose of this call for tenders aims to award the mandate for managing nature protection objects in zone 4 RAFZERFELD. A detailed description of the tasks can be viewed in tender documents.. Published Date: 2024-05-01. Closing Date: 2024-06-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BUILDING DIRECTORATE CANTON OF ZURICH OFFICE FOR SPATIAL DEVELOPMENT. Summary: Project Croissance 2050 - Assistance De Project Baudirektion Kanton Zurich Office of Spatial Development. Description: By 2050, the canton of Zurich should have nearly 2 million inhabitants. A population growth strategy must be developed in the context of a collaboration between offices and departments and with the participation of other actors. The strategy must make it possible to develop objectives and areas of action to successfully meet the challenges that will arise by 2050. The purpose of this call for tenders is to entrust an external support mandate to the project. This support includes project management services, process design, specific technical services in a wide thematic fan, project to support the project as well as communication services. The service provider must provide the corresponding references and experience of key people. Consortiums can be formed. A global offer must be submitted.. Published Date: 2024-04-29. Closing Date: 2024-06-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF ZURICH DISPOSAL + RECYCLING ZURICH. Summary: Maintenance Services for the Video Surveillance System in the Hagenholz (kva Hh) City of Zurich Disposal + Recycling Zurich Recycling System.. Description: The advertised services include maintenance services and the necessary material deliveries for the video surveillance system in the Hagenholz (KVA HH) gripping system for the years 2024 to and 2029. The maintenance services to be carried out include planning, engineering, programming, maintenance, repair, exchange -, commissioning, documentation, remote maintenance work and investment changes as part of dismantling, expansion and conversion work on the existing system as well as material deliveries required for replacement devices, spare parts as required for the video monitoring system in the KVA HH and at the Recyclinghof, which Werdhölzli sewage treatment plant (RH kWh). If necessary, the delivery and implementation of standard software or development and implementation of individual software is required. See part A.. Published Date: 2024-04-10. Closing Date: 2024-05-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISS ARMY / ARMASUISSE. Summary: Rfi Training Platform Shooting Infantry Weapons Armasuisse Competence Area Resources and Support Cc Wto. Description: Request for Information (RFI) in favor of a procurement market analysis of a training platform for shooting training with infantry weapons: In various projects from the Swiss army and Armasuisse, the training concept requires that an indoor trainer should be used for shooting training. As part of the “Method attempt for more efficient, more efficient and emission -reduced weapons training”, it should also be checked whether a simulation solution for the training of assault rifle and pistol brings advantages. A universal simulation platform is evaluated, on which other future systems can also be integrated. A uniform simulation platform would also enable a common (team) training with different weapons and simplify the application by the instructors. In addition, this could reduce the operating costs and allow cost -effective integration of future system if the simulation platform is selected.. Published Date: 2024-04-02. Closing Date: 2024-04-16. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: SWISS ARMY / ARMASUISSE
output.Summary: Rfi Training Platform Shooting Infantry Weapons Armasuisse Competence Area Resources and Support Cc Wto
output.Description: Request for Information (RFI) in favor of a procurement market analysis of a training platform for shooting training with infantry weapons: In various projects from the Swiss army and Armasuisse, the training concept requires that an indoor trainer should be used for shooting training. As part of the “Method attempt for more efficient, more efficient and emission -reduced weapons training”, it should also be checked whether a simulation solution for the training of assault rifle and pistol brings advantages. A universal simulation platform is evaluated, on which other future systems can also be integrated. A uniform simulation platform would also enable a common (team) training with different weapons and simplify the application by the instructors. In addition, this could reduce the operating costs and allow cost -effective integration of future system if the simulation platform is selected.

Zurich, Nature Conservation Department. Description: The "Fachstelle Naturschutz (Fns)" is the competent authority in the Canton of Zurich for the application of nature protection legislation for all supracommunal nature protection objects. It deals with the conservation of endangered and protected habitats and species from importSupracommunal ance. For this, it is necessary to ensure management consistent with the objectives, to guide visitors and to take numerous maintenance measures to preserve the function of vegetation elements, constructions and infrastructure. For these varied tasks, the Fns Fait Call for External Specialists. The purpose of this Call for Tenders is to award the Management Mandate for Nature Protection Objects in Zone NO 22 Furttal - Limmattal - Katzensee. A detailed description of the tasks can be found in the tender documents.. Published Date: 2024-02-02. Closing Date: 2024-03-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: Based on its municipal master plan, the city of Schlieren wishes to launch in 2024 a total ordinary revision of its construction regulations and zone plans. This will first relate to the treatment of priority measures of the master plan, as well as to the adaptation of new regulations and zone plans to notions and measurement methods defined by the intercantonal agreement on the harmonization of terminology in The construction field (AIHC). It will then be a question of adjusting it to the current revision of the planning and construction regulations for a territorial development adapted to the climate. The legality and relevance of the current zoning, as well as those of the construction provisions and indices of use, must therefore be examined in a targeted manner. Adequate attention must also be paid to public participation as part of the total revision. The Mandate design office is called upon to develop the contents of the total revision and support the municipal executive, as well as the management and the project team throughout the process. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: DIRECTORATE FOR CIVIL ENGINEERING, TRAFFIC AND CITY GREEN, CIVIL ENGINEERING OFFICE OF THE CITY OF BERN. Summary: Renvation De La Voye Effectiveruser - Transformation the L'stops of Copic Park, Renouvellancy Desceptive. Description: The LSA K005 regulates the Belp-/Effingerstras node, the LSA K015 regulates the Efferinger-/Seilerstrasse node. The two control devices have been in service since 2010, respectively 2004, and have reached the critical age of an LSA. The LSA K015 will now be integrated as partial node 3 in the K005 command. The K015 control device will be dismantled. The renovation must make it possible to ensure operating safety for LSA and adapt the LSA infrastructure to the current state of the technique. This renewal takes place at the same time as the project "renovation of the effingetrasse path". In addition to the replacement of the control device, all the signal transmitters will be equipped with very low voltage, modern and economical LED signal transmitters In energy, and all masts and complete wiring will be renewed. TP entry will be transposed to the system currently in force with radiotelegrams. The existing coordination cables will be partially renewed. In addition, the pipe installations in the node area will be fully replaced.. Published Date: 2023-11-08. Closing Date: 2023-12-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Description: The LSA K005 regulates the Belp/Effingerstrasse node, the LSA K015 regulates the knot Effinger/Seilerstrasse. The two control units have been in operation since 2010 or in 2004 and have reached the critical age of an LSA. The LSA K015 is now being integrated into the control of K005 as partial nodes 3. The K015 control unit is dismantled. With the renewal, operational safety for the LSA is to be ensured and the infrastructure of the LSA is to be adapted to the current state of the art. This renewal is carried out together with the “Gleiss renovation Effingerstrasse” project. In addition, for the compensation for the control unit, all signal providers are converted to modern and energy-saving small-voltage LED signal providers and all masts and complete cabling are renewed. The public transport recording is being implemented on the current system with radio relapse. The existing coordination cables are partially renewed, and the pipe systems in the node area are also completely replaced.

This call for tenders relates to the supply and installation work of final vertical lasigaling (fixed signals: police signals, directional panels in the shape of arrows and/or table; variable signals: large panels of intention). input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BASLER VERKEHRSBETRIEBE BVB. Summary: Delivery of Steles, Stelen Heads and Signs 2023-2028 Basel Verkehrsbetriebe, Bvb. Description: In order to standardize their appearance, the Basel traffic companies have changed their passenger information system at the stops between 2014 and 2020. These information steles, or information pillars, are part of the stop equipment of the Basel traffic companies and at the same time serve as information and orientation points for passengers and tourists. As of December 31, 2022, a total of 671 steles were installed on the 690 holding edges of the BVB, and after around 10 years since the first steles were created, the replacement cycle of the first stelae is slowly beginning. In addition, as a result of accidents and / or vandalism, steles are damaged and replaced. This includes the production and delivery of the quantities predefined in the price sheet. There is no acceptance guarantee of the quantities listed.. Published Date: 2023-09-02. Closing Date: 2023-10-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: BASLER VERKEHRSBETRIEBE BVB
output.Summary: Delivery of Steles, Stelen Heads and Signs 2023-2028 Basel Verkehrsbetriebe, Bvb

These information steles, or information pillars, are part of the stop equipment of the Basel traffic companies and at the same time serve as information and orientation points for passengers and tourists. As of December 31, 2022, a total of 671 steles were installed on the 690 holding edges of the BVB, and after around 10 years since the first steles were created, the replacement cycle of the first stelae is slowly beginning. There is no acceptance guarantee of the quantities listed.

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: VAUD CANTONAL POLICE. Summary: Transport of Detainees, Support for Personnel in the Prison Area and the Secure Holding Area. Vaud Cantonal Police. Description: The Vaud Cantonal Police, respectively the Gendarmerie, manages all activities in its prison zone (Zc) located at La Blécherette and the secure maintenance zone (Zms) in Renens. It also ensures the transfer of Vaud detainees throughout Switzerland. For reasons of its own organization, the cantonal police currently has, following a previous call for tenders on public contracts, the support of 5 private security agents. This contract coming to an end, the police Cantonale launches a new call for tenders in open procedure on public markets for a maximum period of 5 years.. Published Date: 2023-08-30. Closing Date: 2023-10-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The Junction of Matran is located at the intersection of the N12 motorway and the RC 2000 connecting Romont to Villars-sur-Glâne. The redevelopment project of the N12 junction of Matran provides for the regulation by luminous lights of the two crossroads of the junction ("Junction-West" and "Junction-Est") as well as of the two extremity crossroads (crossroads of "wood" and "publo"). This call for tenders concerns the supplies and installation of the final light signaling equipment (controllers, masts, fire boxes, detectors, including wiring, etc.) as well as the programming of the four aforementioned crossroads.. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ZURICH CANTONAL POLICE, PROJECTS/PROCUREMENTS/QUALITY. Summary: New Duty Belt. Description: The cantonal police in Zurich would like to replace the previous deployment belt with a new one. The new harness should meet increased ergonomic requirements in terms of pressure points and weight distribution. In addition, the system is to be converted to the modern and universal MOLLE system. The upgrade is to be phased in over the next four years, with a total of 2,600 sets (carrier strap and deployment belt with MOLLE system) being assumed. The aim is to provide firefighters with a modern, universal and ergonomically comfortable onestrap.<br> Doc Title: Police equipment<br> Contract Type: Supplies. Published Date: 2023-07-18. The call for tenders concerns all types of control plates issued in accordance with the prescriptions of the order regulating the admission of people and vehicles to traffic (OAC Art 82 SS) and the DFJP instructions on June 2 1987. Prices are to be indicated by plaque or playing two plates with the same number in accordance with the attached submission document. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF ZURICH, SERVICE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORT/CITY OF ZURICH. Summary: Tailor -made Prioritization of Selected Transport Types City of Zurich, Service Department of Transport. Description: According to the decision of the city council (No. 1710/2022), the Zurich model for traffic control is to be further developed and expanded. For this purpose, the possibility should be created to be able to prioritize certain road users on the urban light signal systems (LSA). The aim is to create green corridors for SRZ vehicles and the prioritization of bicycles on selected nodes, e.g. along bike preference routes. In contrast to the currently used physical detectors, the implementation should consist of virtual detectors. The basis for this is an always current digital image of the city, including all node furniture. The solution should be open with regard to a possible future expansion by other types of transport.. Published Date: 2023-05-05. Closing Date: 2023-05-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: CITY OF ZURICH, SERVICE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORT/CITY OF ZURICH
output.Summary: Tailor -made Prioritization of Selected Transport Types City of Zurich, Service Department of Transport
output.Description: According to the decision of the city council (No. 1710/2022), the Zurich model for traffic control is to be further developed and expanded. For this purpose, the possibility should be created to be able to prioritize certain road users on the urban light signal systems (LSA). The aim is to create green corridors for SRZ vehicles and the prioritization of bicycles on selected nodes, e.g. along bike preference routes. In contrast to the currently used physical detectors, the implementation should consist of virtual detectors. The basis for this is an always current digital image of the city, including all node furniture. The solution should be open with regard to a possible future expansion by other types of transport.

For this reason, this RFI (Request for Information) has been published on www.simap.ch.Hurz description of the services: The Jail Transport System (JTS) operates various transport lines all over Switzerland for prisoner transport. It regularly connects different official institutions (detention centers, public prosecutors, federal asylum centers, airports, etc.) by means of secure vehicles and accompanied by specialized staff. In addition, special transports (also on weekends) and express feedback (on the same time) are possible outside the regular company. Between 14,000 and 19,000 people are transported each year, with 1 to 1.5 million kilometers of people being covered. JTS is used in particular for the transport of people, of whom a low security risk assumes, and thus significantly relieves the transport capacities of the police and correctional authorities. Description: The Wuelflinger-/ Salomon-Hirzel-Strasse is a heavily used main access axis from the autobahn to the center of the city of Winterthur. The "Schloss" node is a three-armed node at which the buses have to use priority routes. Due to a lack of turning possibilityToday, the supplementary line 2E has to make a U-turn in the Haerti district, about 1.5 km away. For this reason, a bus reversing system must be implemented at the Schloss junction. Description: For the implementation of the BAV's ERMTS strategy, SBB AG is procuring railway safety systems on its entire route network in two batches using long-term framework agreements (time horizon for system procurement at least 10 years). The scope of the services consists mainly of security payments(SA) with external signaling (LSS), driver's cab signaling (FSS) and object controllers (OC) based on EULYNX Baseline 4.1 (BL4.1) or higher including the respective aftercare. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: STATE SECRETARIAT FOR ECONOMIC AFFAIRS SECO SECTION WEHU. Summary: Swiss Tourism for Sustainable Development Project (St4sd). Description: Implement, manage and monitor the "Swiss Tourism for Sustainable Development Project Vietnam”, which aims to contribute to a more sustainable and inclusive tourism sector in Vietnam by supporting policy makers to foster sustainable tourism (ST) and create fora for public-private dialogue, establishing an executive hospitality training programme and promoting innovative concepts for businesses and destinations to strengthen sustainability. Concrete support will be provided through three components: 1) National and sub-national plans and policies include relevant actions, and decisions are taken and implemented to foster sustainable tourism development; 2) Vietnamese training institutions have been selected and strengthened to provide training and develop skills in sustainable tourism; and 3) tourism destinations and companies have become more sustainable in their operation and investments. The mandate covers a period of 4 years with an option for an additional phase of 4 more years. <br> Doc Title: Foreign economic-aid-related services <br> Contract Type: Services. Published Date: 2022-09-04. Closing Date: 2022-11-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
